attributes.action: Cut all russian energy suppliers for private and businness customers
attributes.additional_details: Following the acts of russian agression towards Ukraine it will hit russian economy and will help to end the war in Ukraine
attributes.background: Cut all russian energy supply in UK

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Place the strictest possible sanctions on Russia until it withdraws from Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609428

Full embargo of Russian imports in lieu of active military support in Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609457
